name: 就这消消乐
description:
This is an emoji elimination game that can bring you more fun when you are bored and unhappy.
How to play:
The game can be eliminated by three or more identical expressions in a row. If you eliminate them in a row, you will get a higher score.
Multiple sets of emoticons for this game can be used to eliminate root player interaction.
Players can also generate their favorite emoticons at any time.
Players can also import local emoticon models to generate new emoticons belonging to the player.
